Plintissa stomped angrily up to the Maximal base. Dracona trying to calm her
down. Upon seeing the Maximal base Plintissa was furious. Plintissa walked
up to the base and suddenly fell calm. "Iron Raptor, this is Plintissa, i
request entrie so we can talk." Plintissa said. Dracona pointed to herself.
"Oh, and Dracona is with me now, she's a Maximal and won't hurt anyone."
Plintissa said...
----- Original Message -----
From: "FIRE FOX" <firefox_y2k@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, June 03, 2000 7:11 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> (OOC: Sorry I haven't been on, I've got Finals.)
>
> Tavatron took a deep breath as she slowly began to calm herself. She
raised
> her head as she sniffed the air, her animal instincts beginning to take
> over. Her eyes closed to meer slits as she slowly stalked through and
around
> the trees in a very wolf-like fashion.
>
> Her tail stopped twitching and her steps were sure and calculated. She
> looked as if she knew what she was doing, and perhaps she did, for once.
> Tavatron growled under her breath as she caught a scent, something wounded
> was nearby. She watched as Dinobot headed in the direction of the scent,
so
> he had scneted the wounded beast as well. Tavatron stopped walking as she
> came to the stream, her com chirped and beeped as Iron Raptor's voice
echoed
> through the forest.
>
> Tavatron sighed, partially in relief but in actuallity was dissapointed
that
> the hunt had been cut short, again. The same thing had happened last time,
> always when they were trying to eat! Tavatron activated her wrist unit:
>
> "We're on our way, Tavatron out." Tavatron then turned to Dinobot, he was
> moving along the bank towards the wounded creature, just thinking about it
> made her mouth water, she really was hungry. Tavatron activated her com
> again, so much for hunting:
>
> "Looks like we're gonna have to cut our hunt short, we've been ordered
back
> to base." Tavatron gazed at herself in the still waters, perhaps she could
> still come away with something...
>
> Tavatron plunged her head into the icy water and closed her jaws about a
> rather large trout. She tossed it on the bank, her head dripping with
water.
> She placed one paw on the flopping fish as she waited for its movement to
> cease. She looked over at Dinobot, maybe she couldn't hunt but fishing was
> another story!
